questions.question: What's something you're excited to improve in your life right now?

questions.placeholder: Write as if you’re describing a future you!
questions.question: Imagine a version of yourself a year from now that you’re proud of. What’s one habit you’ve mastered?
What's your biggest challenge when trying to stick to a new habit?

options.text: Getting back on track after missing a day

questions.legend: 1 represents the least confident and 10 represents the most confident
questions.question: On a scale from 1 to 10, how confident do you feel about starting a new habit right now?
Why is this goal important to you?

options.text: It will make me happier or more fulfilled
It will make me healthier or stronger
It will help me grow or learn something new

questions.question: What’s the first step you’d take to reach this goal?
questions.label: The first step I’d take is:
questions.placeholder: Imagine a small action you can take today.

questions.question: Final Stretch! 🛹
questions.description: We're wrapping this up faster than you can say 'habits.' Just a couple more questions and we'll be ready to roll!

questions.question: Rest Days: Your Productivity Power-Ups ⚡
questions.description: No guilt allowed! Pick your rest days, because the best habits are built with balance in mind.

questions.question: 🎉 You Did It! High Five! ✋
questions.description: You've taken the first step toward an epic journey. Now let's turn dreams into actions. Ready to set your first goal?
